name: Read Binary Files
natural_language_description: 这是 Read Binary Files 节点。主要用于: Reads binary files from disk

fileSelector.name: fileSelector
fileSelector.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Selector | 作用: Pattern for files to read | (必填项)

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read files
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read files | 默认值: data | (必填项)
